thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 25 of 3060
thread.title: Tara C.

author: Tara C.
title: Tara C.
text:
Car rental search in Australia revealed a $260 total. No where in the summary or detail did it show the one-way rental fee of $350! That detail comes later in an email which you either agree to or not. Big waste of time rentalcars.com. Please show this amount upfront and let the consumer decide right there if they can afford it or not. Silly marketing and sales people know how to irritate the customer. You could do much better.
On the plus side, when I called to inquire, the customer service rep was excellent and is fully aware of this marketing ploy when asked. At least someone there was honest.
